item.description:
Broomballers,
We are on for next week, December 17th at 10pm again at the bank of america skating center in downtown providence/ kennedy plaza.
Here is what you need to bring:
1.Helmet of any kind although one with a face mask is best. 2. Gloves of any kind although the more padding the better. 3. Knee pads.4. Shin pads are recommended but not mandatory as well as elbow pads. 5. Bring a black and a white T-shirt to separate teams. 6. $20.00. As far as parking goes you should be able to park on the street at this time of night by the rink, it's usually pretty quiet. Hope to see you all there. Call me if you have any questions @ 401-441-0871.
Thanks Neil
item.name: Rhode Island Broomball January Meetup
